## CreateSelectorOptions.memoizeOptions property

Optional configuration options for the  function. These options are passed to the  function as the second argument.

**Signature:**

```typescript
memoizeOptions?: OverrideMemoizeOptions<MemoizeFunction, OverrideMemoizeFunction>;
```
